EmailTemplate.textOnly: March 2023 Grow your online business Best practices to help boost sales on your site Reach outside your current customer base for new customers, entice first-time e-commerce shoppers to become repeat users, change the look of your shop page, enable carousels, and using promotions are just a few Tips for Making Your Online Business Grow <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/tips-for-making-your-online-business-grow]]>. NCR Freshop Knowledge Base Maintain an efficient walk path. Our Walk Path User Guides <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/freshop/user-guides/walk-path]]> outline the steps for your personal shoppers to work more effectively and reduce mistakes by limiting the time they spend going back and forth between sections. Analyze your data with our Picker Performance <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/picker-performance]]> and Pick Duration <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/pick-duration-report]]> reports.     Manage your slots for upcoming holidays. Our article on Holiday Slot Management <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/holiday-slot-management]]> will show you how to: - shut off slots for a day - reduce slots for a day - increase slots (or order counts) for a day - to replace slots for a day New Features & Enhancements Google Analytics 4 is the new standard that brings new functionality and tracking methods that are not dependent on cookies and sessions. Those using Google Universal Analytics (GAU) will need to Migrate to Google Analytics 4 <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/google-analytics-4]]>. The last date you can use Google Universal Analytics is July 1, 2023. Please email freshop.newsletter@ncr.com to be added to the distribution list for this communication. Thank you!
